summary: WHILE DRIVING, VEHICLE STARTED RUNNING HOT, OVERHEATING.  CONSUMER HAD VEHICLE TOWED TO DEALERSHIP, WHO INDICATED THAT THE CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM WAS THE WATER PUMP.  DEALERSHIP REPLACED THE PUMP, BUT THE PROBLEM RECURRED 3 TIMES WITHIN A SMALL PERIOD OF TIME.  PLEASE PROVIDE MORE DETAILS. TS
